node.title: Convicted terrorist sentenced to more jail time for 'cold blooded' attack on inmate
node.alt: A woman wearing a black niqab and black robes wearing handcuffs surrounded by police.
node.description: Momena Shoma could be locked up until 2066 after after being slugged with more jail  time for trying to drive a pair of garden shears into a fellow inmate's neck.
node.content:
["A grinning\u00a0jihadi who secreted a pair of garden shears in her headscarf before trying to stab a prison inmate could be behind bars until 2066 after being slugged with more jail time over the terrifying attack.", "WARNING: This story contains\u00a0content that some readers may find distressing.", "Momena Shoma was already serving 42 years behind bars after shoving a kitchen knife into her landlord's neck in 2018, but was today sentenced to a further six years by the Supreme Court of Victoria.", "It means that the 28-year-old, who pleaded guilty to engaging in a terrorist act and being a member of a terrorist organisation, will be 72 if she completes her whole sentence.", "After the attack at the prison, Shoma was seen with a \"strange smile\" on her face and was later seen laughing\u00a0by staff.", "She was charged with terror offences and made full admissions, telling investigators that she was only pretending to be deradicalised.", "On Friday, Justice Jane Dixon described Shoma's attack as \"cold blooded\".", "\"Your commission of an act of terrorism was motivated by a warped and violent ideology that is antithetical to the values of our democratic society,\" Justice Dixon said.", "\"You have no contrition for your actions, on the contrary you are proud of your crimes.", "\"You remain committed to your extremist ideology and appear even more radicalised.\"", "", "
Momena Shoma hid the garden shears in her headscarf before attacking\u00a0Canadian inmate Kailee Mitz.(Supplied: Supreme Court of Victoria)
", "In October last year Shoma spotted a 30-centimetre pair of garden shears in the prison yard at Dame Phyllis Frost Centre, where she has been\u00a0incarcerated.", "The court heard that she wrapped the shears in her headscarf and newspaper before seeking out Canadian prisoner, Kailee Mitz, 27, who was lying on a couch.", "The pair exchanged pleasantries before Shoma tried to plunge the shears into Ms Mitz's neck.", "Ms Mitz threw up her hands and managed to avoid most of the attack before she was able to raise the alarm.", "Other inmates had to hold Shoma back.", "Afterwards, Shoma told investigators that Allah would be pleased with her and cheered when she was charged with terror offences.", "\"The stupid girl, just, I don't know what she does, she falls off the couch and runs away outside. Loser. Coward. Just stop so that I can kill you,\" Shoma said.", "\"I would have killed her, stabbed her to death, that was my intention.", "\"If I get released, then I'll do it again.\"", "The court heard that Shoma told investigators\u00a0she was a soldier of the Islamic State group and had been hoping to spark international media coverage by attacking Mitz, because she was a foreign citizen.", "Shoma is now confined to her cell for 23 hours a day and the court heard that her father, who lives overseas, refuses to take phone calls from her.", "Justice Dixon said that Shoma's prospects for rehabilitation were \"very poor but perhaps not non-existent\"."]
